titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding the future of the Supreme Court.
Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding the future of the Supreme Court.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution and Civil Justice.

committee.subcommittee: Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary:
Expresses disapproval of the confirmation of any liberal Justices to the U.S. Supreme Court nominated by President Barack Obama.
Urges the Senate to hold any such nomination until the American people have a chance to speak in the next presidential election.
